title: Pixel 2 stuck in between Home screen and Splash screen
content:
My Pixel 2 is stuck in between Home screen and Splash screen. I hold down POWER button and VOLUME Up/down buttons randomly. Sometimes,I got the following screen shown up:

Android Recovery
Google/walleye/walleve
10/QQ24.200405.005/6254899
user/release-keys
use volume/down and power
.......
(Two options offered)
Try again
Restore Factory data

And sometimes, I got the following screen:

Android logo laying down the chest opened
Boot loader: mw8998-002.0001.00
Baseband: g8998-00020-1912122233
Product Revision: walleye MP1
Serial Number: FA7A71A00185
UFS: 128G Hynix
DRAM: 4096MB Samsung LPDDR4
Boot-slot: b
Console: DISABLED
Secure Boot: yes (PRODUCTION)
Device State: Locked
ERROR: Operation Denied

I can use Volume UP/DOWN buttons to navigate some options: Start, Restart bootloader, Download mode, Recovery mode, Barcodes, Power off

    I would like to save my personal data (e.g. Line, Facebook, business transactions associated apps etc.) before I try to reboot with Factory data. What should I do? Does it help to download my personal data to the notebook if I choose "Download mode" option, and upload the data to my Google cloud, and then restore my Pixel 2 with "Recovery mode" command?

Please help, thanks in advance
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 2
